remarks: Binary relation expressing the modular pair property.  This version quantifies an ordering instead of an inference.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdbr4 $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A MH B <-> A. x e. CH ( ( ( x i^i B ) vH A ) i^i B ) C_ ( ( x i^i B ) vH ( A i^i B ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
